column4: Can anyone recommend a GUI for a database system, that's NOT openoffice??
I'm not really sure.  SQL supports views, you won't get a GUI form-ish thing, no.  You'd have to make one (which isn't too difficult)

You could use any programming language to make a variety of types of UIs.  There may be some pre-fam "form" sort of thing, but I'm not aware of one.  You might ask in #mysql or #postgres or something similar if they have any tools
